    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentDateTime

        private java.lang.String getCurrentDateTime()
        Returns the current date-time in the format dd-MM-yyyy_HH-mm-ss. The current date time is used for logging as well as for the name of the log file (when the application started)
        Returns:
        current date-time as a String

      • getInstance

        public static final Logger getInstance()
        Returns the instance of the class. If the instance does not exist yet, it will be created first.
        Returns:
        the instance of the class

      • log

        public void log(Logger.Type type,
                java.lang.String message)
        Logs a message into the log file. The message is going to be printed out into the terminal as well
        Parameters:
        type - type of the message that is going to be logged
        message - message itself that is going to be logged
